name: Monkeee
description:
This is an early access survival, 'isolation' themed single-player game, made by Ege Kol and Berkin Külah. 

You can aim and fire with a mouse to kill zombie(?) robot Monkeees and run away with move buttons or with WASD keys. 

Our goal is to survive the most waves we can and expand your territory with upgraded guns against more and more powerful Monkeees (Work In Progress, please follow us for the next updates)
